support.text: Helsinki e-commerce support team will answer you questions or problems related to the payment of at {{email}}. We will respond to your questions within two business days. In matters related to the service, the boat berths' own customer service Boating will help you.

checkout.general-description: You are about to order the following products

phone.label: Telephone number
phone.helper-text: If you want to, enter your telephone number in the format +358401234567

terms.cb-label: I have read and accept the <1>terms of service</1>
terms.cb-error: Accept the terms of service before making your payment.

payment-methods.choose-payment-method-info: Select one of the following payment methods and click on ‘Go to the payment service’. You will be directed to your selected payment service.
payment-methods.no-payment-methods-info: Payment methods are not available right now. Please try again in a moment.

subscription-terms.cb-label: Olen tutustunut ja hyväksyn jatkuvia tilauksia koskevat yleiset <1>ehdot</1>
subscription-terms.cb-error: Hyväksy ehdot ennen kuin siirryt maksamaan

notification.label: Kuitti lähetetty
notification.description: Olemme lähettäneet vahvistusviestin sähköpostiisi {{email}}. Voit tarkistaa ja tulostaa tiedot myös täältä.

purchase.invalid-instant-purchase-link: No service or product could be found via the link you used. Please return to the service and try again.
purchase.invalid-instant-purchase-variables: The link you used is invalid. Please return to the service and try again.
purchase.not-valid-for-checkout: Tilaus ei voida maksaa koska se on jo maksettu.

error.generic-error: Unfortunately, an error occurred and your order could not be processed normally. Please try again.
